Literature.Title: Novel Modifications of Nonribosomal Peptides from Brevibacillus laterosporus MG64 and Investigation of Their Mode of Action
Literature.Author: Li Z, de Vries RH, Chakraborty P, Song C, Zhao X, Scheffers DJ, Roelfes G, Kuipers OP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Xanthomonas campestris pv. campestris NCCB 92058(MIC=2µg/ml),Xanthomonas translucens pv. graminis LMG 587(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. antirrhini LMG 2131(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. tomato DC3000(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae LMG 20218(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ET8(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli MG1655(MIC=16µg/ml),Pectobacterium carotovorum LMG 5863(MIC=>32µg/ml),Ralstonia syzygii subsp. syzygii LMG 6969(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=2µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 14579(MIC=2µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium LMG 16003(MIC=2µg/ml)
